title: Stephanie Land: "Maid"
description: Michael's conversation with Stephanie Land, author of "Maid: Hard Work, Low Pay, and a Mother's Will to Survive." The book is the basis for a Netflix series that launched in the Fall of 2021. Original Air Date 6 February 2019. The book was published on 22 January 2019.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Stephanie Land, TC Scornavacchi)
